ARTICLE.TITLE: From wearing 'Corona' helmet to improvising songs, police get creative to raise awareness about the virus
ARTICLE.TEXT:
01 / 05

(Photo Credit : Times Now)

Tasked with ensuring that people remain indoors during the 21-day lockdown imposed in the country, police officers are coming up with creative ways to spread awareness about the deadly virus. From making announcements to singing songs, the police officials are doing everything to guide the public.



1. Chennai cop wearing "Corona" helmet

In a bid to spread awareness about the global pandemic, an artist in collaboration with a police officer made a "Corona" helmet that is made in the shape of the deadly virus to prevent commuters from coming out on the streets during the 21-day nationwide lockdown.
